name: Iso Maze Isometric Game
description:
Description

Join this enjoying isometric game and have fun jumping on the bricks and collecting coins! Tap on the left side of the screen to jump on the left and vice versa. Be careful, spikes destroy you! Beat the high score and compete with your friends!

For Android game: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=alfonso2607 

For iOS only Download at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/temple-adventure-runner-2016/id1094834103?ls=1&m...

More android and Apple games at: http://vamoose-game.com
